entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.1] Request Delegate Generator emits nullable annotations when Nullable Reference Types not enabled #54020
  • Blazor 6.0 app fails to compile in 8.0.200. #54019
  • .NET 8 Blazor - OnChange() Migration To Static Rendering #54018
  • Failing test CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton in 8.0 on Windows.Amd64.Server.2022 #54017
  • WebHostTests.HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported failing on Fedora.34 in release/8.0 #54016
  • Perf regression: json #54014
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54013
  • npm publishing is broken #54012
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21386: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #54008
  • SpaProxyMiddleware Launch Page #54006
  • `[AllowedValues]` and `[DeniedValues]` case insensitivness suport #54003
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Provide Better Developer Feedback for Parameter Deserialization Issues #54002
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Support localization change without page reload #54001
  • TicketSerializer deserialized authentication ticket does not match the serialized one. #53998
  • .NET 8 Blazor - NavigationManager.NavigateTo() Inconsistent Behavior #53996
  • Expose JavaScript interoperability Initialization Status in Blazor #53995
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Form With Multiple Buttons Inconsistent Behavior #53993
  • [DataProtection] Deadlock at application start when trying to get DataProtection key from Azure KeyVault #53989
  • InputSelect not selecting the binded value as expected #53988
  • AddDataProtection().SetApplicationName does not allow one project to read values set by another #53987
  • Blazor QuickGrid - Add class based on row item context property value #53982
  • donet 8 Blazor Interactive Server does not route to Razor Pages (MVC) #53979

Closed

  • [Blazor] `@key` is not respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53289
    8.0.x
  • Registration confirmation link incorrect for /register endpoint in net8.0 Identity #52666
  • StreamRendering Not Working As Expected #53980
  • Blazor App, individual Accounts and Authorization #52800
  • Incorporate template analyzer into the build #35238
  • Find replacement for NuGet Package Verifier #18931
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53981
  • Hosting bundle downgrade error when 6.0.11 exists #45491
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add configurations to test matrix #36032
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM child component rendering, despite indentical parameters #53990
  • restore.cmd fails if environment variable "projects" defined #35796
  • Globalization and Upgrading a Package #54004
  • Update test matrix for .net 8 #46555
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quickgrid table design problem #53729
  • Blazor page route set to "/bin" causes 404 Error when published to Azure #53645
  • Managing Checkboxes with [SupplyParameterFromForm] in Blazor #53884
  • Handle 3rd party NPM dependencies in source-build #53710
  • Perf improvement: json, json #53952
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53969
  • UseStaticFiles, ability to log not found file's path. #53711
  • Ignore issue comments starting with "Looks like this PR hasn't been active for some time..." #53859

PullRequests

Created

  • [Infrastructure] Add a github workflow to update NPM dependencies #54000
    area-infrastructure
  • [Infrastructure] Update npm dependencies #53986
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53985
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53984
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53983
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #54009
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.28
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #54011
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.3
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #54010
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.17
  • Fix time scale #54021
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview2
  • Update build to use a local package cache from a submodule and build offline #53975
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53746
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53918
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Don't auto-label wtgodbe's PRs #53978
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24112.1 #53955
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview2
  • Adding retry to POST_ServerAbort_ClientReceivesAbort #53293
    area-networking, 9.0-preview2
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    area-infrastructure, feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview2
  • Make Identity tests use public API to configure EF. #52910
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Update Identity dependencies #53883
    area-infrastructure
  • Add missing TimeProvider registration #53946
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, area-routing
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-networking
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-networking
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    area-auth, community-contribution
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution, Planning: WebUI
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr
  • Avoid excessive WellKnownType cache misses in RDG #50669
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Try Adding Support for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Change nullability annotation of HostString.Value to explictly allow null #53568
    area-networking
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Added a null check in ResolveHasInvalidAntiforgeryValidationFeature() #53208
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Harden SignatureEquals nullability checks #53052
    area-networking
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    area-networking
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52103
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, 8.0.x
  • Pass dotnetEfVersion in Helix test runner #52104
    area-infrastructure
  • Update OAuthHandler.cs #53762
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-security
